Package: org.ysb33r.gradle.vfs

[Groovy] Interface VfsURI

  • Abstraction to work with resolved VFS URIs.

    Authors:
    Schalk W. Cronj√©

        URI that has been resolved

    • Method Detail

      • java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> getPraxis()

        Any VFS action options (praxis) that are associated with this URI

        Returns:
        List of potential options

      • java.lang.Object getUri()

        URI that has been resolved

      • boolean isLocal()

        Whether this URI is local

        Returns:
        True if local

      • boolean isResolved()

        Returns true is this URI has been resolved

        Returns:
        True if located on the virtual file system

      • VfsURI resolve()

        Attempts to stage the URI if it is not already resolved,

        Returns:
        A resolved URI
        Throws:
        Exception if URI cannot be resolved
